name: Crap Job (NES)
description:
Play with Billy, who has a shitty job cleaning the windows of large buildings.

The enemies will not leave you alone and your boss has given you little time to finish the job.

=======================================

Download & installation

Download the ROM and run it in an NES emulator such as Fceux or Mesen. 

We recommend Mesen
